name: Back to Mom
description:
Go back to MOM! Help the elephant babies on their path to find their MOMS!

Help little and cute animal babies find their moms in the park. When moms say 'BACK TO MOM!', it’s time to GO! So, don’t waste time, and find all moms with the least possible moves!
But be careful… the park is like a maze, and it is full of misleading paths.

You can help not only elephant babies, but also others animals, like koala babies. Have fun with different animal species!

Addictive PUZZLE GAME for all family!
Are you able to get 3 stars in all levels?

Features:
- 40 levels (more to come!)
- Easy control: just swipe the animal babies
- Cute and lovely animals available
- Challenging and breathtaking puzzles
- Designed for all ages
